title: Method Statement for Installation of Conduits and Fittings
description:
Document Summary: Method Statement for Installation of Conduits and Fittings is electrical engineering documentation suitable for MEP construction works. See Content Synopsis Below.

1.)Purpose
This method of statement covers the installation of conduits Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Cast in situ, Concealed on Block Walls, Surface mounted and Underground Installations as defined in the General Specification.

2.)Scope of Works
This procedure will define the method to be used to ensure that conduit installations and workmanship are correct and acceptable and shall conform to the Contract Documents and Specification

3.) Pre-Installation
3.1) All materials and documentation relevant to this particular Section of works will be checked by the Construction Department prior to the commencement of works. Ensure that all materials to be installed are inspected and accepted by the Consultant.
3.2)Access to start the work will be confirmed that they are in a suitable condition for permanent works to commence. The document is editable according to your preferences.
